survey_brief: This survey aims to assess employees' perceptions and experiences regarding air quality in the workplace and its impact on their productivity and well-being.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the air quality in your workplace?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for clarity and consistency.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the air quality in your workplace?

questions.question_text: Which of the following issues have you experienced due to workplace air quality? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections to capture common issues.

script.question_text: Which of the following issues have you experienced due to workplace air quality? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How often do you notice fluctuations in air quality (e.g., stuffiness, odors) in your workspace?

script.question_text: How often do you notice fluctuations in air quality (e.g., stuffiness, odors) in your workspace?

questions.question_text: Which of the following best describes the air ventilation in your workspace?
answer_options: Good - mostly fresh with occasional issues
Poor - frequent stuffiness or poor circulation
Very poor - constant issues with ventilation
questions.client_notes: Use descriptive options to capture nuances in ventilation quality.

script.question_text: Which of the following best describes the air ventilation in your workspace?
answer_options: Good - mostly fresh with occasional issues
Poor - frequent stuffiness or poor circulation
Very poor - constant issues with ventilation

questions.question_text: Have you reported any air quality concerns to your employer or facilities management?
answer_options: I was not aware this was an option
questions.client_notes: Include an option for those unaware of reporting channels.

script.question_text: Have you reported any air quality concerns to your employer or facilities management?
answer_options: I was not aware this was an option

questions.question_text: If you reported air quality concerns, how satisfied were you with the response?
questions.client_notes: Include an 'N/A' option for those who did not report concerns.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: radio button (single-choice) with conditional display.

script.question_text: If you reported air quality concerns, how satisfied were you with the response?

questions.question_text: Do you believe poor air quality has affected your productivity at work?
questions.client_notes: Capture both the degree of impact and uncertainty.

script.question_text: Do you believe poor air quality has affected your productivity at work?

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest to enhance air quality in your workspace? (Open-ended)
questions.client_notes: Allow open-ended responses to gather qualitative feedback.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest to enhance air quality in your workspace? (Open-ended)

questions.question_text: Does your workplace have any visible air quality measures in place (e.g., air purifiers, plants, open windows)?
answer_options: No, none that I can see
questions.client_notes: Include an 'Unsure' option for those who may not notice these measures.

script.question_text: Does your workplace have any visible air quality measures in place (e.g., air purifiers, plants, open windows)?
answer_options: No, none that I can see

questions.question_text: How often does your workplace communicate about air quality or related health initiatives?
questions.client_notes: Use clear frequency options to gauge communication effectiveness.

script.question_text: How often does your workplace communicate about air quality or related health initiatives?
